pullRequest.title: KOGITO-204: Introduce OUIA attributes to unify kogito integration tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ensemble together with:

kiegroup/kie-wb-common#3333

For more details see: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-204

nodes.bodyText: I wouldn't prefix with 'qe-' ... data-ouia is for use in testing, the prefix for the value is redundant.

imo we don't need for the id to keep all the hierarchy (I assume that the first variable is specifying the parent element, correct me if I am wrong) - OUIA_COMPONENT_TYPE + "-" + "dock.getIdentifier()" should be enough, you'll typically navigate in tests by:
cy.get(dock-by-ouia-id).get(item-by-ouia-id) so the item-by-ouia-id selector needs to be unique just in context of given dock (thus we can save some letters in name).
Though, based on your preference and rules you want to set for the project.
